item.title: Re: Anyone completed Kaiju's Bargain Quest yet
item.content:encoded:
There's a Village Upgrade you need to buy called 'Chaos Gate'. This costs 1 Million Ryo and 2 of each Advanced Resource.

You don't need to be an Immortal Realm to buy it, but you do need both the Fox and Sand Demon Monuments.

Being in a Village with the Chaos Gate and being S2+ opens up the Kaiju's Bargain quest.

Completing it requires that you have an item called 'Errant Bit'. This item is obtainable through a rare AA-Rank mission (you'll know it when you see it). It's a Nin 25d25s Mission. It drops Errant Bit, but ONLY if your Crank is at 1+. There also happens to be an INCREDIBLY low chance of actually getting the Bit, so using the Power of Greass is highly reccomended.

Completing the Quest grants you access to r00t.

As for Immortal Realms, there is a special mission that the Sannin Kaijukage of an Immortal Realm can do that requires 100 Errant Bits, but to my knowledge nobody has completed it yet.

You do NOT, however, NOT have to be in an Immortal Realm to start r00t.
